text: Ercan Albay (born 4 December 1954) is a retired Turkish football midfielder and later manager. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Turkish footballers Category:Samsunspor footballers Category:Adana Demirspor footballers Category:Adanaspor footballers Category:Giresunspor footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Turkey under-21 international footballers Category:Turkish football managers Category:Mersin İdman Yurdu managers Category:Adana Demirspor managers Category:Adanaspor managers
title: Ercan Albay
